select * from wip_glassinfo
glassid =#GlassID#
cassettesequenceno =#CassetteSequenceNo#
slotsequenceno=#SlotSequenceNo#
portid=#PortID#
cassetteid=#CassetteID#
order by createdate desc

select * from wip_glassinfo
currentunit =#CurrentUnit#
order by createdate desc

cassetteid = #CassetteID#
order by createdate desc

currentunit =#CurrentUnit#
currentsunit =#CurrentSUnit#
productalarm =#ProductAlarm#
order by createdate desc

UPDATE wip_glassinfo SET modelposition=#ModelPosition#
cassettesequenceno =#CassetteSequenceNo#
slotsequenceno=#SlotSequenceNo#

UPDATE wip_glassinfo SET cvdflag=#CVDFlag#
cassettesequenceno =#CassetteSequenceNo#
slotsequenceno=#SlotSequenceNo#

UPDATE wip_glassinfo SET slotsatus=#SlotSatus#
cassettesequenceno =#CassetteSequenceNo#
slotsequenceno=#SlotSequenceNo#

UPDATE wip_glassinfo SET slotsatus=#SlotSatus# where cassettesequenceno =#CassetteSequenceNo# and slotsequenceno in (#SSNo1#,#SSNo2#,#SSNo3#,#SSNo4#,#SSNo5#,#SSNo6#,#SSNo7#,#SSNo8#,#SSNo9#,#SSNo10#, #SSNo11#,#SSNo12#,#SSNo13#,#SSNo14#,#SSNo15#,#SSNo16#,#SSNo17#,#SSNo18#,#SSNo19#,#SSNo20#, #SSNo21#,#SSNo22#,#SSNo23#,#SSNo24#,#SSNo25#,#SSNo26#)

cassettesequenceno =#CassetteSequenceNo#
slotsequenceno=#SlotSequenceNo#

UPDATE wip_glassinfo SET enddate=#EndDate#
cassettesequenceno =#CassetteSequenceNo#
slotsequenceno=#SlotSequenceNo#

UPDATE wip_glassinfo SET fetchdatetime=#FetchDatetime#
cassettesequenceno =#CassetteSequenceNo#
slotsequenceno=#SlotSequenceNo#
statements.delete:
delete from wip_glassinfo
portid =#PortID#
glassid =#GlassID#
cassettesequenceno =#CassetteSequenceNo#
slotsequenceno=#SlotSequenceNo#
cassetteid=#CassetteID#
id=#ID#
slotsatus=#SlotSatus#
delete from wip_glassinfo where createdate < to_date(#value#,'YYYY-MM-DD')
